name: fut-manager-microservices
description: Sistema de gestión de campeonatos de fútbol con arquitectura de microservicios

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/gateway-service && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../team-service && npm install && cd ../sanction-service && npm install && cd ../../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:team" "npm run dev:sanction" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:all: cd services/gateway-service && npm run build && cd ../auth-service && npm run build && cd ../team-service && npm run build && cd ../sanction-service && npm run build && cd ../../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test:all: cd services/gateway-service && npm test && cd ../auth-service && npm test && cd ../team-service && npm test && cd ../sanction-service && npm test
scripts.lint:all: cd services/gateway-service && npm run lint && cd ../auth-service && npm run lint && cd ../team-service && npm run lint && cd ../sanction-service && npm run lint && cd ../../frontend && npm run lint

author: FutManager Team
